title: Everything you need to know about Android updates on Samsung Galaxy devices
content:
Updates are crucial to the health and overall performance of your Samsung Galaxy phone, no matter when it was made. This complete guide will give you all the information you need about Samsung’s Android and security updates, timelines, and more.

more…

The post Everything you need to know about Android updates on Samsung Galaxy devices appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Want to make sure your Galaxy phone is up to date? Here's how to update your Samsung Galaxy phone and what you need about security updates.
